title: Grading Summer Game Fest 2022 - Kinda Funny Gamescast
description:
Go to  http://meundies.com/kindafunny to get 15% off your first order or 25% off your first Membership item.

Go to http://chime.com/kfgames to get started with Chime.

Tim, Greg, Bless, andy, and Mike grade Geoff Keighley's Summer Game Fest 2022 Showcase!

Gamescast Background Art by https://twitter.com/Orioto

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:01:30 - Housekeeping
00:02:30 - Summer Game Fest 2022 Score
00:25:54 - Ads
00:27:45 - Our Personal Highlights

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
